author: Ziona 'Zizi' Wali
title: 'I'm 7 and a Cake Frosting Master'
description: I practice making frosting flowers on the table with the leftover cream. Every day when I finish classes I tell mommy I want to frost a cake.
content: I started frosting cakes a year ago, when I was six years old. I don't really remember it, but Mommy says that she started baking when I was eight months old. I would be in a baby carrier on her backâ€¦ [+3253 chars]
